Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID: A growing problem in need of intervention.

Abstract.AbstractText: The number of people who have survived COVID-19 is overwhelming-official figures approach half a billion. Thus, any long-term consequences in COVID-19 survivors could have a huge impact on public health and on healthcare services in the coming months and years, with potentially 100 million individuals affected.
